mapper.select: select KK.*, d.status from (select TO_CHAR(a.start_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as start_date, TO_CHAR(a.end_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as end_date, a.title, a.assign_code from assign a, class b, class_ing c where b.class_code = c.class_code and a.class_code = b.class_code and c.id = #{id} and b.class_name = #{className} order by end_date) KK, assign_attach d where KK.assign_code = d.assign_code(+)

select * from (select TO_CHAR(a.start_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as start_date, TO_CHAR(a.end_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as end_date, a.title, a.assign_code, b.class_name from assign a, class b, class_ing c where b.class_code = c.class_code and a.class_code = b.class_code and c.id = #{id} minus select TO_CHAR(a.start_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as start_date, TO_CHAR(a.end_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as end_date, a.title, a.assign_code, b.class_name from assign a, class b, class_ing c, assign_attach d where b.class_code = c.class_code and a.class_code = b.class_code and a.assign_code = d.assign_code and c.id = #{id}) where TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd') <= end_date order by end_date
select a.assign_code, a.title, a.start_date, a.end_date, b.class_name, a.class_code from assign a, class b where b.id=#{id} and a.class_code=b.class_code order by a.end_date,b.class_name

select a.name, a.id, c.status, b.end_date, b.title from member a, assign b, assign_attach c where b.class_code=#{classCode} and c.assign_code=#{assignCode} and a.id=c.id and b.assign_code=c.assign_code order by c.status
select distinct a.name, a.id from member a, class_ing b, assign c where b.class_code=#{classCode} and a.id=b.id and b.class_code=c.class_code
select class_code, class_name from class where id=#{id} and cpcheck='3' and end_date >= sysdate
mapper.update: insert into assign (assign_code, class_code, start_date, end_date, regdate, title, content, uploadpath, filename, filetype) values (#{assignCode},#{classCode},TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),sysdate,#{title},#{content},#{uploadpath},#{filename},#{filetype})
mapper.select: select count(*) from class_ing where class_code=#{classCode}
select count(*) from assign_attach where assign_code=#{assignCode}
